gloss: a cord fastened around the neck with an ornamental clasp and worn as a necktie
a cord fastened around the neck with an ornamental clasp and worn as a necktie
a short ring fastened over a rod or shaft to limit, guide, or secure a machine part
a band to tie or buckle around the body (usually at the waist)
a cord fastened around the neck with an ornamental clasp and worn as a necktie
a double knot made of two half hitches and used to join the ends of two cords
(of clothing) fastened by lapping one edge of the front well over the other usually with a double row of buttons
a curved section or tier of seats in a hall or theater or opera house; usually the first tier above the orchestra
